name: Transistor Console Version
description:
Fight against the Process to liberate the city of Cloudbank from the Camerata in this minimalist version of the original game. 

This project based on Transistor has 10 levels with 5 different types of enemies: Creeps, Snapshots, Fetches and Jerks, 4 different attacks: Crash(), Breach(), Ping() and Load(), and an implementation of the Turn() planning from the original.

Credits
  • Original game Transistor by Supergiant Games
  • Sound effects from mixkit.co
  • Song "In Action" by Crowander is licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0
  • Song "Left Unsaid-section 1" by Soularflair is licensed under CC BY-NC-ND 4.0
